uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.io.structure

Class StructureWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.io.structure.StructureWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkflowBundleWriter

    public class StructureWriter
extends Object
implements WorkflowBundleWriter
    A WorkflowBundleWriter that writes a WorkflowBundle in Scufl2 Structure format.
